---
# Feature request template for new ideas.
name: Feature request
description: Suggest an idea or enhancement
labels: ["enhancement"]
body:
  - type: textarea
    attributes:
      label: What problem are you solving?
      description: Describe the use case.
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    attributes:
      label: Proposed solution
      description: Outline your suggested approach.
    validations:
      required: true
